plot: In this film we journey to a farm animal sanctuary and meet people who describe their path to Gandhi's philosophy of ahimsa, which translates as 'no harm' or 'no violence,' and how it affects every choice they make in their lives.
title: Ahimsa
plot_es: In this film we journey to a farm animal sanctuary and meet people who describe their path to Gandhi's philosophy of ahimsa, which translates as 'no harm' or 'no violence,' and how it affects every choice they make in their lives.
plot_en: In this film we journey to a farm animal sanctuary and meet people who describe their path to Gandhi's philosophy of ahimsa, which translates as 'no harm' or 'no violence,' and how it affects every choice they make in their lives.
